Development - apply for street names and house numbers ({case_ref})

Total number of blocks in development {numberBlocks}
Total number of flat/unit subdivisions in development {numberFlat}
@endaf:if
@af:if({applicantsCategory} = 'Tenant' and {applicationType} = 'Rename an existing street' or {applicationType} = 'Change to new addresses due to the scheme changing after the notification certificate has been issued')

Tenants cannot normally change or register an address, only the owner or landlord's representative. Please email SNN@portsmouthcc.gov.uk with the problem you are experiencing.

@endaf:if
@af:if({applicantsCategory} = 'Tenant' and {applicationType} = 'New development or request for change of address')

Only the owner can carry this out,please contact the landlord/owner or their representative and get them to apply

@endaf:if

@endaf:if
@af:if({applicationType} = 'New development or request for change of address' and {applicantsCategory} != 'Tenant')

Location (existing address) of development {#location}
Planning application reference {planningApplication}
Estimated completion date {estimatedCompletion}
Do you have suggestions for road(s)/building block name(s) {#suggestions}
Postal delivery {postalDelivery}
@endaf:if
@af:if({applicantsCategory} != 'Tenant' and {applicationType} = 'New development or request for change of address')
New roads to be considered for formal adoption by Portsmouth City Council {newRoad}
@endaf:if
@af:if({applicationType} = 'Rename an existing street' and {applicantsCategory} != 'Tenant')
Existing street name {existingStreetName}
@endaf:if
@af:if({applicationType} = 'Rename an existing street' and {applicantsCategory} != 'Tenant')
Number of properties on street {numberOfProperties}
@endaf:if

Select supporting document type (e.g. Site plan) {supportingDocuments}
@endaf:if
@af:if({supportingDocuments} = 'Supported documents to be submitted later')

The registration process cannot commence until all supporting documentation has been supplied

@endaf:if
@af:if({numberOfProperties} > '1')

If your requested change affects more than one property in the street, then two thirds of all owners/businesses must agree to the change. This will be checked by the council before the request can be processed further.

If you wish to discuss this change before making any payment, please email SNN@portsmouthcc.gov.uk

@endaf:if
@af:if({numberOfAddresses} > '1')

If your application is to change the existing address for more than one property then at least two thirds of owners must agree to the change"

@endaf:if
@af:if({applicationType} = 'Rename an existing street' and {applicantsCategory} != 'Tenant')
Proposed street name {#proposedStreetName}
Reason for change {#reasonForChange}
@endaf:if
@af:if({applicationType} = 'Change to new addresses due to the scheme changing after the notification certificate has been issued' and {applicantsCategory} != 'Tenant')
Number of addresses that require amending {numberOfAddresses}
Existing address {#existingAddress}
Proposed address {#proposedAddress}
Reason for change {#reason}
@endaf:if
@af:if({uploadSupportedDoc} != '')
Documents checklist {#docChecklist}
@endaf:if
@af:if({applicationType} = 'Correct a postal address')

This is where Portsmouth City Council holds an existing address that is different to that held on Royal Mail postal address (PAF).

If found to be an error (in either database) change will normally be free of charge.

@endaf:if

@endaf:if
